description: A pirate crew led by Captain Bluejam, hired by the Goa Kingdom nobles to set fire to the Gray Terminal. The crew is defeated when Bluejam is beaten by Ace and Dadan.

keyMoments.title: Bluejam Fights Dadan and Ace
keyMoments.description: Captain Bluejam confronts Dadan and Ace in the burning Gray Terminal.
keyMoments.significance: Final battle for the Bluejam Pirates captain.

keyMoments.title: Bluejam Defeated
keyMoments.description: Bluejam is defeated by Ace and Dadan, left unconscious in the flames. He likely dies in the fire, marking the end of the Bluejam Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the dissolution of the Bluejam Pirates.

statusHistory.reason: Captain Bluejam defeated and likely killed in the Gray Terminal fire

description: A group of mountain bandits led by Curly Dadan who raised Luffy and Ace under Garp's orders. They escape the Gray Terminal fire while Dadan and Ace stay behind to fight Bluejam.

keyMoments.title: Dadan Fights Bluejam
keyMoments.description: Dadan stays behind with Ace to fight Bluejam in the burning Gray Terminal.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Dadan's courage and protective nature.

keyMoments.title: Dadan Family Escapes Gray Terminal
keyMoments.description: The rest of the Dadan Family bandits escape the burning Gray Terminal with Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Ensures the survival of most of the Dadan Family.

description: An organization led by Monkey D. Dragon that opposes the World Government and fights against tyranny and oppression. In this episode, they rescue the Gray Terminal residents and save Sabo's life.

keyMoments.title: Revolutionary Army Rescues Gray Terminal Residents
keyMoments.description: Dragon, Kuma, and Ivankov create a wind path to save the Gray Terminal residents from the fire and welcome them to join the Revolutionary Army.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Revolutionary Army's mission to save the oppressed and recruit those willing to fight against the World Government.

keyMoments.title: Dragon Rescues Sabo
keyMoments.description: Dragon rescues the critically injured Sabo from drowning after his boat is destroyed by a Celestial Dragon.
keyMoments.significance: Saves Sabo's life and leads to him eventually joining the Revolutionary Army as a key member.
